attributes.action: Scrap Any Plans to Ban White Coats and Ties etc by Hosptial Staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These ridiculous ideas are just hasty knee-jerk gimmicks that are ill thought out by a Government looking for easy answers. There is no conrete proof whatsoever that ties, white coats etc are vectors for infection and cross-contamination. We need to consider proper methods such as basic handwashing by visitors.
